questions.style_guide: Anti-heroes count as hero if mostly portrayed as such.

questions.text: Does the character have superhuman abilities?
Is the character part of the X-Men?
Is the character part of the Ultimates (Avengers)?
Is the character primarily human (non-mutant, non-alien)?
Is the character primarily a villain?
Does the character use advanced technology/armor as a core trait?
Is the character a founding member of a major team (Ultimates, X-Men, FF)?
